explanation: [0-0] On a sandy ground, a person rides a blue motorcycle with "RENTHAL" on the screen. Above the screen is "How to (Brake Tap)." The sand is covered with motorcycle tire marks. There is a sand dune in the direction the motorcycle is facing.
[0-5] The motorcycle bumps along the sand and then charges up the sand dune.
[0-5] The motorcycle bumps along the sand and then charges up the sand dune.

[5-11] Then the screen switches to a left hand wearing black and white gloves squeezing the brake on the handlebar, with "1. Pull clutch in" above the left hand. Then the screen switches to a right hand with black and white gloves extending the index finger to the front brake. On the right side of the motorcycle, there is a man in black clothes filming with his mobile phone. Above the right handlebar is "2. Lock brake & release". Then the right index finger pulls the brake once.
